values.name: GUILD_TEXT
values.description: a text channel within a server

values.name: DM
values.description: a direct message between users

values.name: GUILD_VOICE
values.description: a voice channel within a server

values.name: GROUP_DM
values.description: a direct message between multiple users

values.name: GUILD_CATEGORY
values.description: an [organizational category](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/115001580171-Channel-Categories-101) that contains up to 50 channels

values.name: GUILD_NEWS
values.description: a channel that [users can follow and crosspost into their own server](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/360032008192)

values.name: GUILD_STORE
values.description: a channel in which game developers can [sell their game on Discord](https://discord.com/developers/docs/game-and-server-management/special-channels)

values.name: GUILD_NEWS_THREAD
values.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_NEWS channel

values.name: GUILD_PUBLIC_THREAD
values.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT channel

values.name: GUILD_PRIVATE_THREAD
values.description: a temporary sub-channel within a GUILD_TEXT channel that is only viewable by those invited and those with the MANAGE_THREADS permission

values.name: GUILD_STAGE_VOICE
values.description: a voice channel for [hosting events with an audience](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/1500005513722)

values.name: AUTO
values.description: Discord chooses the quality for optimal performance

values.name: CROSSPOSTED
values.description: this message has been published to subscribed channels (via Channel Following)

values.name: IS_CROSSPOST
values.description: this message originated from a message in another channel (via Channel Following)

values.name: SUPPRESS_EMBEDS
values.description: do not include any embeds when serializing this message

values.name: SOURCE_MESSAGE_DELETED
values.description: the source message for this crosspost has been deleted (via Channel Following)

values.name: URGENT
values.description: this message came from the urgent message system

values.name: HAS_THREAD
values.description: this message has an associated thread, with the same id as the message

values.name: EPHEMERAL
values.description: this message is only visible to the user who invoked the Interaction

values.name: LOADING
values.description: this message is an Interaction Response and the bot is "thinking"

values.name: FAILED_TO_MENTION_SOME_ROLES_IN_THREAD
values.description: this message failed to mention some roles and add their members to the thread

name: Embed Types

values.name: rich
values.description: generic embed rendered from embed attributes

values.name: image
values.description: image embed

values.name: video
values.description: video embed

values.name: gifv
values.description: animated gif image embed rendered as a video embed

values.name: article
values.description: article embed

values.name: link
values.description: link embed

description: Embed types are "loosely defined" and, for the most part, are not used by our clients for rendering. Embed attributes power what is rendered. Embed types should be considered deprecated and might be removed in a future API version.

values.name: Role Mentions
values.description: Controls role mentions

values.name: User Mentions
values.description: Controls user mentions

values.name: Everyone Mentions
values.description: Controls @everyone and @here mentions
